pages.text: Storage Drawers offers a modular and visually pleasing way to store items in Minecraft. $(br2)Organize your items efficiently using drawers, upgrades, and controllers.
Craft a 1x1 Drawer. $(br2)Drawers can hold large quantities of a single item type.
Craft a Drawer Controller. $(br2)Use the Controller to connect multiple drawers into a unified storage network.
Upgrade your drawers with Capacity and Void Upgrades to increase storage or automatically void excess items. $(br2)Use keys to lock drawers to a specific item or hide item labels.
Storage Drawers is the perfect solution for keeping your storage tidy and your items easily accessible. $(br2)Say goodbye to messy chests and hello to organized storage!
